Introduction

Lucente was a seven-member South Korean boy group under Noga Entertainment. They made their official debut in September 2018 with the mini album "The Big Dipper".

They are presumed to have disbanded as the group's SNS hasn't been active since July of 2020 and multiple members have redebuted in new groups.
